title: Tales of Lyrridia: Volume One
description: Welcome to Lyrridia, a world of swords and sorcery, enchanted relics and mythical beasts. Experience this fantastic realm through the eyes of different characters in this collection of short stories. A master elvin tracker struggles to make a difficult choice. A fainthearted rovaar prince attempts a daring escape. A young swordsman takes a magical journey. A trio of friends duel their mentor.
author: Nikolas Rex
